name: Overview
main:
Assistance needs due to armed conflict and frequent natural disasters include food, healthcare, and protection.? Continued internal displacement as a result of conflict and drought, coupled with an influx of returnees from Pakistan and Iran have led to a significant increase in shelter and WASH needs.? 7.4 million people are in need of humanitarian assistance. However, the high level of insecurity constrains access.?

INFORM measures Afghanistan’s risk of humanitarian crisis and disaster to be very high, at 7.7/10.?
latest_developments_past:
30/08: Flash flooding in eastern Kunar province killed 11 people on 24 August in Ghaziabad district. Dozens of acres of farmland, crops, canals and water heads were also damaged due by flooding, according to local media.?

20/08: The centre of Ghazni City has been cleared, but clashes are still ongoing in the outskirts of the city. Civilian casualties are estimated to be between 200 and 250. Between 7,500 and 18,000 people were displaced due to fighting, some of which have already started to return.?
